#CLEAR
# DEFAULT_MENU.TXT for LK8000 by Paolo Ventafridda
# Release 10 , 130115
#
# USERS SHOULD NOT CHANGE THIS FILE.
# THEY CAN INSTEAD COPY IT TO CONFIGURATION DIRECTORY
# RENAME IT TO SOMETHING, AND THEN ENTER SYSTEM SETUP 
# AND SELECT IT IN ENGINEERING MENU 1, EVENTS
# HOWEVER LK ASSUMES THIS FILE HAS NO BUGS OR PROBLEMS
# NO CHECKS ARE PERFORMED. IF YOU CHANGE IT, YOU ARE
# ON YOUR OWN, NO WARRANY THAT DURING FLIGHT SOMETHING
# DOES NOT WORK!!
# 
# THIS FILE IS ENCODED IN UTF-8 WITH BOM HEADER
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE WITH AN ASCII EDITOR
# USE INSTEAD NOTEPAD++ WHICH IS FREE SOFTWARE
# IF YOU EDIT THIS FILE WITH AN ASCII EDITOR
# IT MAY NOT LOAD CORRECTLY! USE NOTEPAD++ .
#
# DO NOT add comment lines with event or data !
# --------------------------------------------
# mode= must have a blank line first! Blank lines
# must separate modes.
#
# Starting from version 4G, $(  will assume only 1 $( is there.
# If  &( is found, it is replaced with $( and we assume two $( are there.
# MAXIMUM 2 $() labels are allowed!
# 
# To add a RESERVED button use:
# event=Null
# label=$(AC03)
#
# -------------------
# GlideComputerEvents
# -------------------

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_START
event=Service TASKSTART

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_FINISH
event=Service TASKFINISH

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_NEXTWAYPOINT
event=Service TASKNEXTWAYPOINT

mode=default
type=gce
data=TASK_CONFIRMSTART
event=Service TASKCONFIRMSTART

mode=default
type=gce
data=ARM_READY
event=Beep 1
event=StatusMessage ZYX926

mode=default
type=gce
data=COMMPORT_RESTART
event=Service GPSRESTART

mode=default
type=gce
data=STARTUP_SIMULATOR
event=TaskLoad Default.lkt

mode=default
type=gce
data=STARTUP_REAL
event=TaskLoad Default.lkt

mode=default
type=gce
data=TAKEOFF
event=Service TAKEOFF
event=AutoLogger start


mode=default
type=gce
data=LANDING
event=Service LANDING
event=AutoLogger stop

mode=default
type=gce
data=FLIGHTMODE_FINALGLIDE_ABOVE
event=StatusMessage ZYX932

mode=default
type=gce
data=FLIGHTMODE_FINALGLIDE_BELOW
event=StatusMessage ZYX933

mode=default
type=gce
data=FLIGHTMODE_FINALGLIDE_TERRAIN
event=StatusMessage ZYX934


# ------------
# mode=default
# ------------

# clear main entry buttons


mode=default Display1 Display2 Display3 Config1 Config2 Config3 Info1 Info2 Bugs Ballast Wind pan Exit
type=key
data=APP1
label= 
location=1

mode=default Nav1 Nav2 Config1 Config2 Config3 Info1 Info2 Bugs Ballast Wind pan Exit
type=key
data=APP2
label= 
location=2

mode=default Nav1 Nav2 Display1 Display2 Display3 Info1 Info2 pan Exit
type=key
data=APP3
label= 
location=3

mode=default Nav1 Nav2 Display1 Display2 Display3 Config1 Config2 Config3 Bugs Ballast Wind pan Exit
type=key
data=APP4
label= 
location=4

mode=default
type=key
data=6
label= 
event=Null
location=5

mode=default
type=key
data=7
label= 
event=Null
location=6

mode=default
type=key
data=8
label= 
event=Null
location=7

mode=default
type=key
data=9
label= 
event=Null
location=8

mode=default
type=key
data=0
label= 
event=Null
location=9

mode=default
type=key
data=11
label= 
event=Null
location=10

mode=default
type=key
data=12
label= 
event=Null
location=11

###### pan mode ##########

### Hardware keys first

mode=pan
type=key
data=DOWN
event=Pan down

mode=pan
type=key
data=UP
event=Pan up

mode=pan
type=key
data=LEFT
event=Pan left

mode=pan
type=key
data=RIGHT
event=Pan right

### Soft buttons 

mode=pan
type=key
data=APP1
event=MarkLocation pan
label=_@M2070_
location=1

mode=pan
type=key
data=6
event=Zoom in
label=_@M2001_
location=5

mode=pan
type=key
data=7
event=Zoom out
label=_@M2002_
location=6

mode=pan
type=key
data=8
event=NearestWaypointDetails pan
label=_@M2003_
location=7

mode=pan
type=key
data=9
event=Pan supertoggle
# label=_@M2004_$(PanModeStatus)
label=$(AC01)
location=8

mode=pan
type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
label=_@M2005_
location=9

mode=pan
type=key
data=11
event=Service PANREPOS
label=$(AC35)
location=10


#
# These are the hardware keys pressed anytime
#
# Buttons ..
mode=default
type=key
data=APP1
event=Mode Nav1
label= 
location=1

mode=default
type=key
data=APP2
event=Mode Info1
label= 
location=2

mode=default
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config1
label= 
location=3

mode=default
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode Display1
label= 
location=4

# Jog, wheel, rocker etc.
# Scroll wheel for HP31X doesn't have left and right,
# but a long press produces an ESCAPE keycode

mode=default
type=key
data=DOWN
event=Zoom out

mode=default
type=key
data=UP
event=Zoom in

# ----------------------------------------------------------
# mode=Menu 
#
# This is the menu appearing when you click on bottom right corner
# over the aircraft icon.
# Do not remove the EXIT button on location 5!
# ----------------------------------------------------------

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP1
event=Mode Nav1
label=_@M2066_
location=1

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP2
event=Mode Info1
label=_@M2067_
location=2

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP3
event=Mode Config1
label=_@M2068_
location=3

mode=Menu
type=key
data=APP4
event=Mode Display1
label=_@M2069_
location=4

mode=Menu
type=key
data=6
event=Mode MYMODE
label=_@M2131_
location=5

mode=Menu
type=key
data=7
event=Mode default
event=MarkLocation
label=_@M2070_
location=6

mode=Menu
type=key
data=8
event=Mode MC
# label=Mc ($(MacCreadyMode))\n&(MacCreadyValue)
label=$(AC05)
location=7

mode=Menu
type=key
data=9
event=Mode ScreenMode
label=_@M2072_
location=8

type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
label=_@M2011_
location=9

event=Mode default

location=4

type=key
data=6
event=Mode MMC
event=MacCready 5down
label=Mc\n-0.5
location=5

event=MacCready down
label=Mc\n-0.1

label=Mc\n+0.1

location=10

mode=MC
type=key
data=12
label= 
event=Null
location=11

location=3

mode=MYMODE
type=key
data=APP4
event=MyMenu 4
event=Mode default
label=$(MM4)
location=4

event=Mode default

location=5

data=9

event=Mode default
location=8

type=key
data=0
event=Mode default
label=_@M2011_
location=9

mode=MYMODE
type=key
data=11
label=$(MM9)
event=MyMenu 9
event=Mode default
location=10

mode=MYMODE
type=key
data=12
label=$(MM0)
event=MyMenu 10
event=Mode default
location=11

# mode=MMCONF
# -------------

mode=MMCONF
type=key
data=APP1
event=Null
label=
location=1

type=key
data=APP2
event=Null
label=
location=2
